content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">  <title>INSPIRE Geoportal: What's new</title>  <link href="http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/changes.xml" rel="self"/>  <link href="http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml" rel="related"/>  <link href="http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/editor/changes.xml" rel="related"/>  <link href="http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/validator2/changes.xml" rel="related"/>  <link href="http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/roadmap/changes.xml" rel="related"/>  <logo>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/images/logo-ec.jpg</logo>  <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/changes.xml</id>  <updated>2012-12-04T00:00:00+02:00</updated>  <author>   <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>   <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>   <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>  </author>  <generator uri="http://www.redmine.org/">Redmine</generator>  <entry>   <title>Feature #1997: Discovery: Multi-keyword search</title>   <id>http://vap-sdisvn.jrc.it/redmine/issues/show/1997</id>   <updated>2013-06-18T14:35:22+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"> <p>It is now easier to do a multi-keyword search as selected keywords are displayed just below the search box and each keyword can be removed clicking on the 'x' link on its left.</p>    </content>  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Feature #1989: Discovery: Cross-language queries</title>   <id>http://vap-sdisvn.jrc.it/redmine/issues/show/1989</id>   <updated>2013-06-03T16:46:46+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"> <p>The searching capabilities of the Discovery client have been enhanced through the introduction of automatic cross-language queries based on translations taken from the GEMET Thesaurus.<br /> The user can start typing a term in any EU language and a list of matching terms present in the available metadata documents will be shown.<br /> For example, documents containing the word "groundwater" can also be found typing any of the following translations: Подпочвени води, voda podzemní, Grundwasser, υπόγειο νερό, agua subterránea, põhjavesi, pohjavesi, eaux souterraines, talajvíz, acqua sotterranea, gruntinis vanduo, gruntsūdens,riżervi tal-ilma taħt l-art, grondwater, woda gruntowa, águas intersticiais, ape subterane, podzemná voda, podtalnica, podzemne vode, screamhuisce</p>    </content>  </entry>  <entry>   <title>New INSPIRE Geoportal Metadata Validator</title>   <updated>2012-12-04T17:10:06+01:00</updated>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/changes.xml#1734</id>   <content type="html"> <p>The new INSPIRE Geoportal Metadata Validator has been released.<br /> This validator replaces the former "schematron validator"http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/validator/ and implements the same validation criteria applied during the INSPIRE Geoportal discovery process.</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Geoportal: Fixed validation error in the "What's new" Atom feeds</title>   <updated>2012-10-04T00:00:00+02:00</updated>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/changes.xml#1580</id>   <content type="html"><ul><li>Fixed bug preventing the validation of the Atom feeds reporting the changes made to the different sections of the Geoportal.</li></ul><ul><li>Added titles to the entries of the "What's new" Atom feed of the Metadata Validator.</li></ul></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Added "What's new" page and feed to all the pages of the Geoportal</title>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/changes.xml#1433</id>   <updated>2012-07-19T00:00:00+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>Each page of the INSPIRE Geoportal now carries a "What's new" link in its upper right corner, showing the list of relevant changes made to the corresponding service (discovery/viewer, metadata editor, metadata validator).</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/changes.xml#1435</id>   <title>The INSPIRE Geoportal is online</title>   <updated>2011-11-09T00:00:00+01:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>The INSPIRE Geoportal has been released. It provides a single access point to EU geospatial information through its discovery and view service.</p><p>The list of changes is also provided as a Web feed (Atom), which allows subscribed users to be automatically informed about any update.</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry> </feed>
